mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.companyid AS "companyid", a.name AS "name", a.sex AS "sex", a.identityno AS "identityno", a.nativeplace AS "nativeplace", a.residenceplace AS "residenceplace", a.martitalstatus AS "martitalstatus", a.education AS "education", a.worktitle AS "worktitle", a.workpositon AS "workpositon", a.salary AS "salary", a.sort AS "sort", a.ifkey AS "ifkey", a.ifresidencecard AS "ifresidencecard", a.ifquite AS "ifquite", a.qutietime AS "qutietime", a.ifsenioremp AS "ifsenioremp", a.reward AS "reward", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee( id, companyid, name, sex, identityno, nativeplace, residenceplace, martitalstatus, education, worktitle, workpositon, salary, sort, ifkey, ifresidencecard, ifquite, qutietime, ifsenioremp, reward, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{companyid}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{identityno}, #{nativeplace}, #{residenceplace}, #{martitalstatus}, #{education}, #{worktitle}, #{workpositon}, #{salary}, #{sort}, #{ifkey}, #{ifresidencecard}, #{ifquite}, #{qutietime}, #{ifsenioremp}, #{reward}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE employee SET companyid = #{companyid}, name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, identityno = #{identityno}, nativeplace = #{nativeplace}, residenceplace = #{residenceplace}, martitalstatus = #{martitalstatus}, education = #{education}, worktitle = #{worktitle}, workpositon = #{workpositon}, salary = #{salary}, sort = #{sort}, ifkey = #{ifkey}, ifresidencecard = #{ifresidencecard}, ifquite = #{ifquite}, qutietime = #{qutietime}, ifsenioremp = #{ifsenioremp}, reward = #{reward}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
